  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdminHelper
    Helper methods for CacheAdmin/CryptoAdmin/StoragePolicyAdmin
    AdminHelper.HelpCommand  
    CacheAdmin
    This class implements command-line operations on the HDFS Cache.
    CacheAdmin.AddCacheDirectiveInfoCommand  
    CacheAdmin.AddCachePoolCommand  
    CacheAdmin.ListCacheDirectiveInfoCommand  
    CacheAdmin.ListCachePoolsCommand  
    CacheAdmin.ModifyCacheDirectiveInfoCommand  
    CacheAdmin.ModifyCachePoolCommand  
    CacheAdmin.RemoveCacheDirectiveInfoCommand  
    CacheAdmin.RemoveCacheDirectiveInfosCommand  
    CacheAdmin.RemoveCachePoolCommand  
    CryptoAdmin
    This class implements crypto command-line operations.
    CryptoAdmin.CreateZoneCommand  
    CryptoAdmin.ListZonesCommand  
    DebugAdmin
    This class implements debug operations on the HDFS command-line.
    DelegationTokenFetcher
    Fetch a DelegationToken from the current Namenode and store it in the specified file.
    DFSAdmin
    This class provides some DFS administrative access shell commands.
    DFSAdmin.ClearQuotaCommand
    A class that supports command clearQuota
    DFSAdmin.ClearSpaceQuotaCommand
    A class that supports command clearSpaceQuota
    DFSAdmin.DFSAdminCommand
    An abstract class for the execution of a file system command
    DFSAdmin.RollingUpgradeCommand  
    DFSAdmin.SetQuotaCommand
    A class that supports command setQuota
    DFSAdmin.SetSpaceQuotaCommand
    A class that supports command setQuota
    DFSck
    This class provides rudimentary checking of DFS volumes for errors and sub-optimal conditions.
    DFSHAAdmin
    Class to extend HAAdmin to do a little bit of HDFS-specific configuration.
    DFSZKFailoverController  
    GetConf
    Tool for getting configuration information from a configuration file.
    GetConf.BackupNodesCommandHandler
    Handler for GetConf.Command.BACKUP
    GetConf.CommandHandler
    Handler to return value for key corresponding to the GetConf.Command
    GetConf.NameNodesCommandHandler
    Handler for GetConf.Command.NAMENODE
    GetConf.NNRpcAddressesCommandHandler
    Handler for GetConf.Command.NNRPCADDRESSES If rpc addresses are defined in configuration, we return them.
    GetConf.PrintConfKeyCommandHandler  
    GetConf.SecondaryNameNodesCommandHandler
    Handler for GetConf.Command.SECONDARY
    GetGroups
    HDFS implementation of a tool for getting the groups which a given user belongs to.
    HDFSConcat  
    JMXGet
    tool to get data from NameNode or DataNode using MBeans currently the following MBeans are available (under hadoop domain): hadoop:service=NameNode,name=FSNamesystemState (static) hadoop:service=NameNode,name=NameNodeActivity (dynamic) hadoop:service=NameNode,name=RpcActivityForPort9000 (dynamic) hadoop:service=DataNode,name=RpcActivityForPort50020 (dynamic) hadoop:name=service=DataNode,FSDatasetState-UndefinedStorageId663800459 (static) hadoop:service=DataNode,name=DataNodeActivity-UndefinedStorageId-520845215 (dynamic) implementation note: all logging is sent to System.err (since it is a command line tool)
    NNHAServiceTarget
    One of the NN NameNodes acting as the target of an administrative command (e.g.
    StoragePolicyAdmin
    This class implements block storage policy operations.
    StoragePolicyAdmin.GetStoragePolicyCommand
    Command to get the storage policy of a file/directory
    StoragePolicyAdmin.ListStoragePoliciesCommand
    Command to list all the existing storage policies
    StoragePolicyAdmin.SetStoragePolicyCommand
    Command to set the storage policy to a file/directory
